task.summary: Default task
feat: switch to typescript
chore: add shelljs dependency
chore: add yargs and shelljs dependency
chore: add yargs and shelljs and semver dependencies
refactor: extract cli.ts
fix(packageManager): remove console.log, switch to boolean parameters
fix(checkPeerDependencies): check for yalc'd packages using installedVersion, not dependerVersion
chore: Add README.md and CHANGELOG.md

feat: Add better support for packages installed via yalc
Ignore incorrect peer dependencies, if the package has been installed via yalc.
https://github.com/whitecolor/yalc yalc is a tool for locally publishing packages. It's like 'npm link', but better emulates installing a package from npm. If a package has been installed using yalc, we assume that it was intentional. In my workflow, this means I'm testing a package against some downstream integration test.

feat: Recursively check for new unmet peer dependencies after installing when using --install
A peer dependency was installed (using --install) but that package itself had unmet peerDependencies. This change will detect that additional peerDependencies were unmet after running install and recursively installs them.
feat: sort peer dependencies by depender package name first
feat: when recursively installing peer deps, don't re-process previously unmet peer deps

fix: Update packageFilter for breaking change in resolve package
https://github.com/browserify/resolve/commit/ed46ce6a339ce1fa77993da061704a93b79a7fdc
fix: Revert fix for breaking change in resolve package after they reverted the breaking change itself. https://github.com/browserify/resolve/commit/ca0fa418c8628415642a8a365864bc5068cabf0a
feat(debug): Added a --debug cli flag This option prints each package.json that is parsed, and the peer deps found in each one
feat(orderBy): Added a --orderBy cli flag This option changes the sorting of output to either 'depender' or 'dependee'
feat(verbose): Turn off verbose logging by default enable --verbose to show peer dependencies that are already met

fix(peerDevDependencies): Use an array of package names in 'peerDevDependencies' in conjunction with the standard 'peerDependencies' object to install peer deps as devDependencies. This now acts more as an extension of thstandard node packaging rather than adding completely custom behavior.
Also removed check-peer-dependencies-optional-dependency because its postinstall script only gets runs when check-peer-dependencies-optional-dependency package is re-installed. So it was basically a failed experiment.
fix(peerDevDependencies): Make peerDevDependency includes check a bit safer
feat(walkPackageDependencyTree): Check devDependencies too
feat(walkPackageDependencyTree): Check devDependencies too

feat(findSolutions): Add a toggle to find solutions and print installation commands.
BREAKING CHANGE: no longer prints installation commands by default, instead prints a message about using --install
feat(report): For a given unmet peer dependency, show every related peer dependency, even if currently met

feat(orderBy): Change default orderBy to 'dependee'
BREAKING CHANGE: default order changed from 'depender' to 'dependee'
feat(peerDependencyMeta): support peerDependencyMeta in package.json to ignore optional peer dependencies

feat(prerelease): include prerelease when matching ranges, i.e. the range ">=6.0.0" matches "7.0.0-beta.1"
BREAKING CHANGE: Matches prerelease versions
chore: update all dependencies
